name: Curse of Mana Game Jam.
description:
Curse of mana is a mini RPGZeldaisk adventure game! You are in the World  of Mana, and its energy has been weakened over the ages from hero's who uses it wastefully. 

You must go out and gather mana back from those who took it.  Be mindful though, for there is a curse over the World of Mana, and darkness blinds you. Gather mana to restore vibrance to the land.

Be mindful, for you will not be able to tell friend from foe, and not all is worth sacrifice.

Controls are AWDS and Mouse for face Direction.

Left click over a Enemy or Collectable item to kill or break it. a Sword or Axe will show to indicate when to attack. there are secrets within the world to help you along your journey. what is the best goal you can achieve?
